description:
In good weeks freelancing is great, but nobody told you about the bad ones.

Truth is, being a freelancer is a tough ride; but it doesn't have to be that way.

If you are just 'doing okay' as a freelancer then its going to take a real mindset shift to blast through that plateau and really get the results you're looking for.

This course exists to provide you with the full sweep of the landscape of this new mindset and get you thinking, it stops short of diving too deep on any one subject but provides clear, concise advice getting more stable and growing your freelance business â€“ I wanted to pull together only the most actionable bits and areas that will make you think without taking too much of your billable time.

I'm Liam, founder at Freelancelift - a community of freelancers who are serious about getting more from their business. In this course for Udemy I have laid out the framework for all I teach at Freelancelift and it provides an introduction to the ideas you'll need to make 2014 a better freelancing year for you.

Hope you can join me.
title: Grow your freelance business - Fundamentals Bootcamp
